gen:link.msg:message: `EqualisationReserve` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_EqualisationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_EqualisationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E6_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
